Berserk.NAME: Berserk
Berserk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and NL 1 Vulnerable. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable.

Clash.NAME: Clash
Clash.DESCRIPTION: Costs 0 if all cards in your hand are Attacks. NL Deal !D! damage.

Corruption.NAME: Corruption
Corruption.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Exhaust a card and gain [R].
Corruption.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, Exhaust a card and gain [R].

Demon Form.NAME: Demon Form
Demon Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Skills cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.
Demon Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Skills cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.

Dropkick.NAME: Dropkick
Dropkick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, NL gain [R] and NL draw 1 card.

Havoc.NAME: Havoc
Havoc.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card from your discard pile and Exhaust it.

Heavy Blade.NAME: Heavy Strike
Heavy Blade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.
Heavy Blade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

Immolate.NAME: Immolate
Immolate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add two *Burns into your discard pile.

Infernal Blade.NAME: Infernal Blade
Infernal Blade.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random attacks to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Intimidate.NAME: Intimidate
Intimidate.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength for 1 turn. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Juggernaut.NAME: Juggernaut
Juggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Rampage.NAME: Rampage
Rampage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this damage by !M! this combat. NL Increases by more each time it's used.

Reckless Charge.NAME: Reckless Strike
Reckless Charge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Dazed into your discard pile.

Sentinel.NAME: Sentinel
Sentinel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain NL !B! Block.

Sever Soul.NAME: Sever Soul
Sever Soul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increased by !M! for each card Exhausted this combat.

Sword Boomerang.NAME: Boomerang Strike
Sword Boomerang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

Warcry.NAME: Lead the Charge
Warcry.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Put a *Dazed on top of your draw pile.
Warcry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile.

Whirlwind.NAME: Whirlwind Strike
Whirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times.

Wild Strike.NAME: Wild Strike
Wild Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a *Wound on the bottom of your draw pile.
